channel.title: Help
channel.description:
I have this code on my 508 Compile thing
[code]@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause[/code]
I wanna change it to
[code]@echo off javac *.java pause[/code]
But keep it like the first one. I don't know how to explain it. I want it to do what the first one is supposed to do. But a different code.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @_ara72421 §ara72421
item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

Also my JDK 6 update 13 folder is not in my Java folder.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 27, 2009, 08:22:02 pm[/size][hr]I got a error with Newty’s code.

It says

‘javac’ is not recognized as a external or internal command

Or something

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

@echo off cd ../src javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @_ara72421 §ara72421
item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

I have this code on my 508 Compile thing

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause
